query.value: InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'coredns_dns_requests_total' | extend json = parse_json(Tags) | extend dnstype = tostring(json.type) | extend podname = tostring(json.pod_name) | extend podnamespace = tostring(json.namespace) | sort by podnamespace, podname, dnstype, TimeGenerated asc | extend preval =  iif(podnamespace == prev(podnamespace) and podname == prev(podname) and dnstype == prev(dnstype), prev(Val), real(null)) | where isnotnull(preval) | extend corednsreqcount = Val - preval
